shrimp.name: Rect
shrimp.description: Returns 1 if in the Rectangle, otherwise 0
shrimp.author: rconstruct

input.name: x0
input.description: top left x coord of the rectangle

input.name: y0
input.description: top left y coord of the rectangle

input.name: blur
input.description: The amount the edge is to be blurred

output.name: out
output.description: returns 1 if x,y lies within the rectangle

shrimp.usage: Tests whether a 2d point lies inside a 2d Rectangle. Blur can be used to control the antialiasing. The output varies smoothly between 0 and 1 in the blurred region.
